parameters.query:
WITH v AS (
  SELECT
    NULLIF('{{ String($json.realm ?? "default").replace(/'/g, "''") }}','') AS realm_key,
    NULLIF('{{ String($json.principal_id ?? "").replace(/'/g, "''") }}','') AS principal_id,
    COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ JSON.stringify($json.requested_by || {}).replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 'undefined')::jsonb, '{}'::jsonb) AS requested_by
)
SELECT
  v.realm_key AS realm,
  v.principal_id,
  itsm.enqueue_pii_redaction_request(itsm.set_rls_context(v.realm_key), v.principal_id, v.requested_by) AS request_id
FROM v;
